sentences.sContent: Yet, in many ways we are still at the beginning of this commitment.
sentences.sCn: 然而，在许多方面，我们仍处在这一事业的发轫之初。

sentences.sContent: If you can do these things consistently, you will be rewarded in many ways.
sentences.sCn: 如果你一向能做到这些，那么你将会在许多方面得到奖励。

sentences.sContent: So I think that’s probably the most difficult thing right now — that we’re all rationalizing our businesses in many ways because of things that are beyond our control.
sentences.sCn: 因而我觉得这大概是目前最困难的一件事——由于超出我们控制的事物，我们都在用许多方法来为自己的业绩做辩解。

synos.tran: 在许多方面；用许多方法
